targets.rawSql: SELECT v1 FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index

SELECT v1_ps FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT v2_ps FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index DESC LIMIT 1

panels.description: Historial de Factor de potencia total en las últimas 24 horas

targets.rawSql: SELECT totalpowerfactor, time_index FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '1 day'::INTERVAL
